title: The Presentation of the Lord
itunes:title: The Presentation of the Lord
description: This week we celebrate the feast of the Presentation of the Lord in the Temple. In ancient Israel the Temple was the most important place in the world. It was the dwelling place of the Lord; it was where divinity and humanity embraced. But the nation of Israel had gone away from right worship of God. The Christ child is the divine and human in one and thus brings humanity back on line with God.

The Christ child is the divine and human in one and thus brings humanity back on line with God.

itunes:summary: This week we celebrate the feast of the Presentation of the Lord in the Temple. In ancient Israel the Temple was the most important place in the world. The Christ child is the divine and human in one and thus brings humanity back on line with God.
itunes:author: Bishop Robert Barron
